name: Anamo.eu
overview:
Anamo.eu is an online superstore. We will store many products and deliver them to every corner in Europe. We will support many languages and currencies. No one stays out. Maltans or Germans are treated the same. Professional sellers are invited.

Overview Anamo.eu is the first online retailer to see EU as a whole. The simple way to buy products online. Everything in your language, everything in your currency. Mission Our mission is to simplify and enable e-commerce between EU member states and to give every citizen of the Union the option to by cheap, fast and safely. We invite every professional seller (size does not matter) who wants to expand his business online, to join us and advertise/promote/sell his products to every corner of the continent. We take care of all the technical burdens.

Products

  • Anamo.eu Online Store (online store for every EU citizen)
  • Anamo.eu Simple Version + iPhone (online store targeted to small screens, mobile phones, old browsers)
  • Anamo.eu Multilingual Customer Service (multilingual wiki and email services for customer support)
  • Anamo.eu Seller Central (online management console for professional sellers)
  • Anamo.eu Professional Stores (Subscription based service for an online managed store-front, based on our servers)
  • Simple MySQL (part of Anamo.eu Cloud Services, a simple web service for storing small amounts of data on our server in MySQL relational databases)
  • MonkeySourcing (part of Anamo.eu Cloud Services, a simple web service for croudsourcing simple projects. We use it for developing our own catalog and translations)
